item.title: Create a Static Web Page With Github Pages and Hugo
item.description: You can use GitHub Pages to host a website about yourself, your organization, or your project directly from a repository on GitHub.com. Hugo takes Markdown, runs them through a theme template, and spits out HTML files that you can easily deploy online â€“ extremely fast.
